paper_abstract: In this paper, we suggest anew version of the Gauss-Newton method for solving a system of non-linear equations which combines the idea of sharp merit function with the idea of quadratic regularization. For this scheme, we prove general convergence results and, under a natural non-degeneracy assumption,, local quadratic convergence. We analyze the behavior of this scheme on a natural problem class for which we get global and local worst-case complexity bounds. The implementation of each step of the scheme can be done by standard convex optimization technique.
paper_title: Modified Gauss-Newton scheme with worst case guarantees for global performance
